name: url-unshortener
title: URL Unshortener
description: Unshorten/expand those pesky short links in your clipboard or text selection, enhancing your privacy and security.
author: SebDanielsson

commands.name: unshorten-url-quick
commands.title: Paste Unshortened URL
commands.description: Paste unshortened URL to your current app from selection or clipboard.

commands.name: unshorten-url-interactive
commands.title: Unshorten URL
commands.description: Unshorten URL from current selection or clipboard and choose an action.
